Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: OK, OK. Just come in today, and we will see if the doctor can fit you in. You might have to wait, though. And you’re British? Then bring your NHS card. And before you get lost – our address and how to get here, it’s all on our website. Do you know how to find that? OK. The streetnames are all Estonian, so it’s easier if you just look it up. See you!
